Title: FCD: Fréchet ChemNet Distance to evaluate generative models
Description: The Fréchet ChemNet distance is a metric to evaluate generative models. It unifies, in a single score, whether the generated molecules are valid according to chemical and biological properties as well as their diversity from the training set. The score measures the Fréchet Inception Distance between molecules represented by ChemNet, a deep neural network trained to predict biological and chemical properties of small molecules.
Interpretation: Frechet ChemNet Distance (FCD). Higher FCD indicates higher difference to the training set
